rules: Rule1: Provided that paper conf_paper is accepted by reviewer1, the conference academic_conf2024 will be successful.
Rule2: Under the condition that reviewer1 is unavailable for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Rule3: Reviewer1 is unavailable for deadline1 or reviewer1 is sick for deadline1.
Rule4: Provided that reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled, then whenever reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Rule5: Either reviewer1's flight with airlineX is cancelled or reviewer1 has a train available on routeY.
Rule6: If reviewer1 has a train available on routeY, then under the condition that reviewer1 is sick for deadline1, paper conf_paper is either rejected by reviewer1 or accepted by reviewer1.
Rule7: If the paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1, then the conference academic_conf2024 is successful.
Rule8: Either the paper conf_paper is presented remotely by author1 or it is presented in person by author1.
Rule9: Provided that the paper conf_paper is presented in person by author1, the presentation of conf_paper is recorded by tech_team.

Rule10: If it is not the case that the publication of conf_paper proceedings by editor1 leads to the recording of the presentation by tech_team implying conference success, then manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.
facts: Fact1: The proceedings of conf_paper are published by editor1.
Fact2: It is not the case that manual review is needed for conf_paper by chair1.
Fact3: Paper conf_paper is not rejected by reviewer1.
